statements: SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address='127.0.0.1';
SELECT reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY reason ASC, ip_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason = 'spam';
SELECT reason, ip_address FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_blacklisted_ips FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address, LENGTH(reason) AS reason_length FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE LENGTH(reason) > 50;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM blocked_requests ORDER BY blocked_time DESC;
SELECT blocked_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_requests FROM blocked_requests GROUP BY blocked_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT request_id, blocked_ip, blocked_time FROM blocked_requests WHERE blocked_ip IN ('10.0.0.1', '10.0.0.2');
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT request_id, blocked_ip, blocked_time FROM blocked_requests ORDER BY blocked_time DESC;
SELECT blocked_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_requests FROM blocked_requests GROUP BY blocked_ip HAVING num_requests > 10;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address IN ('192.168.1.1', '10.0.0.1');
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY added_on DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, ip_address FROM logs WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT ip_address, reason, added_by FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT ip_address, timestamp, user_id FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' AND ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason = 'malicious activity';
SELECT ip_address, last_accessed FROM ip_history ORDER BY last_accessed DESC;
SELECT ip_address, total_requests FROM ip_history WHERE total_requests > 100 ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT ip_address, request_time, response_code FROM blocked_requests WHERE response_code = 404 ORDER BY request_time DESC;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ip_address, last_accessed FROM ip_history WHERE total_requests > 100 ORDER BY last_accessed ASC;
SELECT ip_address, description FROM whitelist_ips WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT ip_address, request_time, request_method, response_code FROM blocked_requests WHERE response_code = 404 ORDER BY request_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blocked_requests WHERE request_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY request_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE blacklist_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM ip_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, ip_address, log_description FROM blacklist_logs WHERE log_date > '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason = 'Spam' ORDER BY blacklist_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, ip_address, report_date FROM ip_reports JOIN reports_action ON ip_reports.report_id = reports_action.report_id WHERE action_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM ip_reports GROUP BY ip_address HAVING total_reports > 2 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT log_id, ip_address, log_date, log_description FROM blacklist_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
